SEARCH
Package gutek.entities.cards

Class CardSuperMemo2

java.lang.Object
gutek.entities.cards.CardBase
gutek.entities.cards.CardSuperMemo2
@Entity public class CardSuperMemo2 extends CardBase
Represents a card that uses the SuperMemo2 algorithm for spaced repetition. This class extends CardBase and adds fields for managing repetition count, intervals, easiness factors, and incorrect answer counts for both regular and reverse revision processes.

  • Constructor Details

    • CardSuperMemo2

      public CardSuperMemo2(String front, String back, double easinessFactor, double reverseEasinessFactor, DeckBase deck)
      Constructs a new card with the given front, back, easiness factors, and associated deck. This constructor initializes the card's easiness factors and sets the default values for both regular and reverse revision processes.
      Parameters:
      front - the front content of the card
      back - the back content of the card
      easinessFactor - the initial easiness factor for the regular revision process
      reverseEasinessFactor - the initial easiness factor for the reverse revision process
      deck - the deck to which the card belongs

  • Method Details

      public void setRevisionDefault(double easinessFactor)
      Resets the revision parameters to their default values for the regular revision process.
      Parameters:
      easinessFactor - the initial easiness factor for the regular revision process
